description: A person with no morals who views himself as a god amongst his peers. Deems everyone beneath him financially as inferior and will treat them as such so should they be unable to afford lifes neccesities, will charge a literal arm and a couple organs.
name: Shopkeeper

description: Took an arrow to the knee once... Never forgot the trauma and ridicule.
name: Guard

description: Industry standard NPC that teaches players the game without being given a choice. Impossible to skip or kill as developers thing players are unable to understand their "complex" game mechanics.
name: Tutorial NPC

description: A rather rotund fellow whos can often be found gorging himself on the food present in his banquet hall. Frequently keeps spare morsels in his "flavor-savor" for midnight snacking to prevent spending energy on calling an attendent.
name: King
